config.task: Create an automatic electronic-circuit factory that produces 16 electronic-circuits per 60 ingame seconds. Useful information for this task: One burner mining drill mines 15 resources and one electric mining drill mines 30 resources per 60 ingame seconds.  One stone furnace smelts 18 iron and copper plates per 60 ingame seconds and one assembling machine crafts 60 entities per 60 ingame seconds
